ednaldo.title: Ednaldo Pereira Mescladasso DX
ednaldo.string1: Remaster of the original collectathon Ednaldo Pereira: MESCLADASSO. Play as Ednaldo and Fleig, going through a plethra of different stages.
ednaldo.string2: In this game you'll be introduced to the successful EDNALDO PEREIRA. A human being so powerful few are able to fully grasp. The universe is in shambles due to the evildoings of the Dark Elite and you must stop them by using your powers!
ednaldo.string3: This collection also features a PC Port of the original EDNALDO PEREIRA: MOBILE! Adapted to be played with Keyboard and Controller! This is a completely different game and unique experience that has been adapted to perfection in this PC port.
ednaldo.string4: The friendly duo Ednaldo & Fleig are always up to saving the world with the evil doings of the Dark Elite! Ednaldo is a powerful all-knowing beast, while Fleig is his smart and fast companium! Together, they are unstoppable.

Explore different stages filled with obstacles, enemies, and treasures to unlock. Overcome thrilling challenges, collect golden notes, and improve your skills while enjoying vibrant graphics and an exciting soundtrack with remixes of Ednaldo's classics.
ednaldomobile.string3: The game is currently undergoing maintenance @ Google Play. Please play at GX.Games at the moment!

artius.title: ARTIUS
artius.string1: ARTIUS is a momentum-driven 2D platformer bursting with vibrant creativity. When the envious Pivolo seizes control of the mystical ARTIUS book and imposes an oppressive art dictatorship, it‚Äôs up to you to restore freedom. Take charge of four unique artists, each wielding their own creative powers, and fight to save a world on the brink of losing its art forever!
artius.string2: The world of ARTIUS is full of colourful characters, which all have their own personal tales to tell and contribute to the game world.
artius.string4: Pivolo, envious of the protagonists‚Äô artistic mastery, seizes control of the mystical ARTIUS book and enforces an art dictatorship, reshaping the world according to his rigid and oppressive vision. Under his rule, creativity is stifled, self-expression is outlawed, and once-vibrant landscapes become dull and lifeless. As the influence of Pivolo‚Äôs tyranny spreads, society begins to question the value of art itself, forgetting its power to inspire, heal, and bring people together. It falls upon the four heroes‚Äîeach wielding their own unique creative abilities‚Äîto challenge this bleak new reality.
artius.string5: Inspired by Sonic Frontiers' Open Zone and Bomb Rush Cyberfunk‚Äôs world, the hub world is more interactive and immersive than typical platformers, allowing players to explore, customize structures, and engage creatively in this dynamic environment. Levels are linear and divided into acts, with character-exclusive stages to teach specific mechanics. These mechanics are later combined in ‚Äúfinal acts‚Äô, where players seamlessly chain actions across characters for exhilarating gameplay sequences.
artius.string7: ARTIUS is currently seeking funding and publishing opportunities to reach its full potential. If you believe in the power of art and creativity in gaming, now is the time to help make ARTIUS a reality. Stay tuned‚Äîthis adventure is coming soon, and with your support, it can shine even brighter!

pivolo.title: Pivolo
pivolo.subtitle: Evil. Envious. Bitter!
pivolo.desc: Pivolo was a student at the EdAN art school‚Äîan artist who felt increasingly neglected by his classmates due to his controversial opinions on art. He believed that some forms of art were objectively superior to others, putting him at odds with the other students. Over time, he grew jealous of the popularity of Pierre and his friends. Obsessed with power and success, he seized control of the mystical ARTIUS book‚Äî‚Äô‚Äôthe heart of EdAN‚Äô‚Äô‚Äîand imposed an artistic dictatorship over the city of Rupestrine, reshaping it according to his rigid and oppressive vision. Under his rule, creativity is stifled, self-expression is outlawed, and the role of art in society is reduced to fitting his own artistic vision. As Pivolo‚Äôs tyranny spreads, society begins to question the value of art itself, forgetting its power to inspire, heal, and bring people together. It falls upon four heroes‚Äîeach wielding their own unique creative abilities‚Äîto challenge this bleak new reality.

pierre.title: Pierre
pierre.subtitle: Painter. Determined. Perseverant!
pierre.desc: Often teased by his friends for being too serious, Pierre is a painter who has no time for ‚Äò‚Äôplaying around.‚Äô‚Äô Not a man of words but of actions, he believes in the fundamental goodness of humanity and nature. His art is a reflection of love, freedom, and optimism for the future. When he‚Äôs not painting or going on adventures with his friends, he enjoys making pasta for himself and, believe it or not, listening to electronic music. His favorite painters are Salvador Dal√≠ and Van Gogh, but he has a special love for the hopefulness of Norman Rockwell. He joined the prestigious EdAN art school as a child, and thanks to his unwavering artistic professionalism and virtuosity, has gained both fans ‚Äì and haters. Being Pierre‚Äôs friend may not be the easiest thing in the world, but it is certainly one of the best!

walter.title: Walter
walter.subtitle: Adorable. Photogenic. Charming!
walter.desc: Finding someone who doesn‚Äôt love Walter, the lovable giant of EdAN, is harder than finding a needle in a haystack. Selfless to a fault, he is always ready to help anyone he can, regardless of whether they are a friend or a stranger. A passionate photography enthusiast, Walter has immersed himself in every place a camera can reach, capturing moments of his friends, landscapes and events. A cinephile at heart, he loves watching movies and if you let him, he'll go on and on about all the 'fun facts' you can imagine. Among his friends, he is the voice of reason, keeping their wilder ideas in check. He also enjoys watching tennis matches‚Äîpreferably while indulging in a generously sized salad bowl!

guga.title: Guga
guga.subtitle: Energetic. Playful. Adventurous!
guga.desc: Hyperactive and always up for a prank, Guga is the super-athletic ballet dancer from EdAN. A small ball of energy, he can‚Äôt stop moving and loves playing jokes on his friends, especially Pierre, who is constantly irritated by him. Despite this, Pierre tolerates him (or at least tries to). He loves talking‚Äîsometimes a bit too much‚Äîeven though most of the time his words don't quite make sense. Always ready to help and lend a hand, Guga is a true friend. A child of the isolated northern regions of Rupestrine, he‚Äôs unafraid to explore the unpredictable and the strange, much to the amusement of his friends and colleagues. Whether it‚Äôs pushing boundaries or cracking jokes, he makes life more fun and unpredictable for everyone around him.

rene.title: Ren√©
rene.subtitle: Elegant. Melodious. Sophisticated!
rene.desc: Ren√© is the youngest of four children from an aristocratic family. Introduced to music at an early age, he was already playing Mozart on the piano by the time he was five. Timid and sincere, he came to Rupestrine to study music and joined EdAN later than his friends, making him the newest member of the group. Still uncertain about his future and searching for his place in society, one thing remains clear: his life will always revolve around music. A lover of elegance, Ren√© has a deep appreciation for French perfumes, vintage cars, and fine dining, often taking it upon himself to teach his friends the finer points of etiquette and sophistication. However, his clumsiness and awkward demeanor often get in the way of making a good impression, leading him to fumble through words and actions, much to his own embarrassment. He is a devoted cat person, drawn to their grace and quiet companionship, seeing them as the perfect embodiment of refinement‚Äîmuch like a perfectly folded napkin at a five-star restaurant.

rupestrine.title: Rupestrine
rupestrine.subtitle: The Little Princess of the Arts
rupestrine.desc: Rupestrine is a city renowned for its rich artistic history. Officially named Rupestrine Union, the city earned its title thanks to the discovery of some of the oldest archaeological sites in the region, filled with cave paintings, petroglyphs, and other forms of rock art. Over time, this deep artistic heritage transformed the city into a cultural hub, attracting musicians, painters, sculptors, dancers, and all those involved in the fine arts. This artistic flourishing culminated in the founding of the EdAN Art University, which stands for Excellens Doctrina Artis Nationum‚Äîmeaning 'Excellence in the Teaching of the Arts of Nations'‚Äîa symbol of the city‚Äôs commitment to nurturing creativity. The city is undeniably rich, but many feel that the power is overly concentrated in the hands of the artistic elite. This concentration of influence has led to a sense of political isolation among the general population, fueling movements and growing anti-artist sentiment. The divide between the artists and the people has become a source of tension, with many citizens feeling excluded from the decisions and opportunities that shape their city‚Äôs future. While its cultural landscape is vibrant, Rupestrine's economy remains predominantly agricultural, with vast hectares dedicated to the cultivation of beans and coffee, supporting the livelihood of many in the region.

ducklagoon.title: Duck Lagoon
ducklagoon.subtitle: The sea of sweet water and love
ducklagoon.desc: Nestled between water on all sides, Rupestrine is a secluded city-peninsula, with access that is both limited and elusive. At the heart of this coastal haven lies Duck Lagoon, a magical beachfront where people, boats, and ships constantly come and go. Sunny skies, bright mornings, and rocky structures fill the area with charm and beauty. A perfect destination for a weekend or holiday, Duck Lagoon is one of the many places that make Rupestrine exceptional and special. Its surrounding waters are as sweet as candy, leaving a lasting impression on every foreigner. One of the many myths that captivate the minds of the city‚Äôs inhabitants is that of a mysterious figure‚Äîthe ''bride''‚Äîwho appears every full moon night. Some say she‚Äôs a bride, others claim she‚Äôs a duck, and some even describe her as a ''duck bride,'' whatever that means. No one knows for sure what she is or if she even exists, but those who have encountered her can assure you that she does. The name of the beach dates back to its founding when Spanish conquistadors took shelter there and accidentally let some of their ducks escape. The birds adapted well to the region and populated it, turning it into the cheerful, duck-filled shore we know today.

about.title: About.
about.description: PVic Games was founded in July, 2023 with the release of Ednaldo Pereira: Mobile. Created by art school dropout Pedro Victor 'Pvic' Gon√ßalves, a veteran in the Sonic community and later, the key gameplay programmer for Antonblast -- one of the most widely celebrated indie games in recent times -- PVic Games' founding ideals are simple: make high quality, artistic games that transcend our simplistic ideals of imagination and creativity and take us to another place. 'Pure Imagination' is more than a tagline, it's where our hearts are.
about.description2: The journey has just begun, and we invite you to step into our world of creative silence -- where imagination is the ultimate refuge of freedom.

developers.title: Devs.
developers.text: The developers at PVic Games are responsible for building the technical foundation of our projects. Whether it's games, tools, or any form of interactive systems -- they ensure everything works the best it can. Pedro Victor 'PVic' Gon√ßalves, in addition to being a programmer, is also the director and producer of the studio, leading the team and ensuring each project follows our creative vision. Gabriel Casanova, computer science nerd, is the one behind this webpage you are reading RIGHT NOW; and Kevin 'John-Kun' is our additional gameplay programmer which has made a plethra of Sonic fangames throughout their lifetime.

artists.title: Artists.
artists.text: The visual aspect of our games comes to life thanks to the talent of our artists, who are responsible for illustrations, sprites, animations, and the overall graphic style that defines our identity. Shin, Bitto, Pablo, and Brediamai contribute unique styles and engaging artistic direction, ensuring that each world has personality and visual depth.

musics.title: Musicians.
musics.text: Games aren't anything special without some good and jammin' tracks. Each PVic Games project features original bops that are appropriate to their respective worlds while still being in-line with what we like. Glace Sue, SpeedVGM, and SaGa! bring creativity and impact to our productions, while Luan Maziero also played an important role in previous projects.

communication.title: Social.
communication.text: Our connection with the community is shaped by the voices behind our social presence. Lucia, Vitor, and StarCaster handle public relations, community engagement, and social media interactions, ensuring that our message is clear, authentic, and engaging. Whether through announcements, updates, or direct conversations with players, they bring our vision to the world and keep the dialogue alive.
